title: SBI plans to enhance threshold limit under instant loan scheme for MSME sector
description: SBI plans to increase the threshold of the instant loan scheme for MSMEs from Rs 5 crore. SBI aims to simplify MSME credit by leveraging digital tools and reducing the need for collateral. Additionally, SBI intends to open 600 new branches this financial year, enhancing its extensive network.
